title: 7 Mouth-Watering Omelet Recipes to Try at Home
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Has breakfast become a boring routine? Spice up your mornings with these seven mouth-watering omelet recipes, courtesy of The Spruce Eats.

1. Cheesy Pizza Omelete

Of course, you can have pizza for breakfast — in an omelet. For this recipe, you’ll need all of your favorite pizza toppings: mozzarella cheese, chopped pepperoni, tomato sauce and some basil to bring out the flavor. Good news is, this “pizza” is gluten-free and guilt-free.

View the full recipe here.

2. Philly Cheesesteak Omelet

Next up, is a Philly Cheesesteak sandwich in an omelet. This savory omelet recipe calls for steak, cheese, onions and sauce (Worcestershire or Sriracha, whichever you prefer). If this omelet fails to wake up your taste buds in the morning, well . . .

View the full recipe here.

3. Classic French Omelet

Add some French flair to your omelet and you’ll feel like you’re having breakfast in the city of love. The flavor is simple, yet heavenly. In addition to eggs and butter, you’ll need two tablespoons of Gruyere cheese, two teaspoons of chives, sea salt, olive oil and freshly ground black pepper.

View the full recipe here.

4. Kosher Mushroom and Onion Omelet

Have this omelet for breakfast or dinner, it’s that good. You’ll need three Chino Valley Ranchers pasture-raised eggs, ½ of a medium onion, salt, unsalted butter, crimini mushrooms, shredded cheddar cheese and chives. Serve this omelet with salad, a baguette and a glass of wine.

View the full recipe here.

5. Egg White Greek Omelet

If you prefer a lighter omelet, try this Greek-style white omelet. The ingredients include feta cheese, kalamata olives, cherry tomatoes and spinach. It’s almost like salad for breakfast, except the main ingredient is egg whites and the flavor is even more tantalizing.

View the full recipe here.

6. Spanish Omelet

You’ve tried French, Philly, and Greek omelets. Now it’s time for a “tortilla española.” This national dish is made with potatoes as the filling and can be served any time of day. Choose Chino Valley Ranchers pasture raised eggs for a brighter yellow color and extra nutrition.

View the full recipe here.

7. Japanese Omelet

The Japanese omelet is an omelet wrapped around fried rice and drizzled with ketchup. The filling can include chicken, vegetables, onion, green pepper and white mushrooms.

View the full recipe here.
